{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16051v1", "title": "Manin's conjecture for the chordal cubic fourfold", "summary": "We prove the thin set version of Manin's conjecture for the chordal (or:
determinantal) cubic fourfold, which is the secant variety of the Veronese
surface. We reduce this counting problem to a result of Schmidt for quadratic
points in the projective plane by showing that the chordal cubic fourfold is
isomorphic to the symmetric square of the projective plane over the rational
numbers.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT,math.AG", "published": "2025-04-22T17:27:23Z"}
